mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bottle for dried serum
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hyland Laboratories [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Empty clear glass bottle with black rubber cap and liquid dispenser attached. Label Information: Stock No. 6505-159-8390; 3 cc. size; 75 Tests; Dried Human Blood Grouping Serum, Anti-B; Contains Sodium Azide 0.1% when reconstituted; Lot No. A303C2; Expiration date 1960-03-18; Hyland Laboratories, Los Angeles, Calif., U.S.A. U.S. Lic. No. 140.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
